text: Wuyuan railway station () is a railway station of Hefei–Fuzhou high-speed railway in Wuyuan County, Jiangxi. A statue of Zhan Tianyou, the pioneering Chinese railway engineer of Wuyuan origin, stands in front of the station. ==History== This station commenced services with Hefei-Fuzhou HSR on June 28, 2015. It became a junction with the opening of the Jiujiang–Quzhou railway on 28 December 2017. ==References== Category:Railway stations in Jiangxi Category:Railway stations in China opened in 2015
title: Wuyuan railway station
